publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1714 Jackie Baillie: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2001—That the Social Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*

S1M-1714 Jackie Baillie: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2001—That the Social Justice Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Modifications of Schedule 5) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran
